Uses of Interface
jgame.listener.Listener

  • Packages that use Listener 
    Package Description
    jgame
    The JGame package contains everything related to the JGame game library.
    jgame.listener
    The jgame.listener package contains the framework for JGame's listener system.

    • Uses of Listener in jgame

      Fields in jgame with type parameters of type Listener 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Listener> GObject.listeners
      The list of listeners on this object.
      private java.util.List<Listener> GObject.listenersToBeAdded
      The list of listeners to be added.
      private java.util.List<Listener> GObject.listenersToBeRemoved
      The list of listeners to be removed.
      Methods in jgame with parameters of type Listener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GObject.addListener(Listener l)
      Adds the given listener to the listener list.
      void GObject.removeListener(Listener l)
      Removes the given listener from the listener list.

    • Uses of Listener in jgame.listener

      Classes in jgame.listener that implement Listener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundaryRemovalListener
      Removes the target component if it is outside of the absolute game bounds.
      class  ButtonListener
      A listener that allows an object to act as a button.
      class  DelayListener
      A listener that will be invoked once after a given number of frames.
      class  FrameListener
      A listener that is run every frame (i.e., FrameListener.isValid(GObject, Context) always returns true).
      class  GlobalClickListener
      A listener that listens for clicks anywhere in the game area.
      class  GlobalKeyListener
      A listener that listens for a key being pressed anywhere.
      class  HitTestListener
      A listener that listens for hit-tests of the given object or class.
      class  LocalClickListener
      A listener that listens for clicks on the object.
      class  LocalKeyListener
      A listener that listens for a key being pressed on this object.
      class  ParentBoundsListener
      A listener that is valid when the target object is not completely inside the parent's bounding box.
      class  TimerListener
      A listener that is valid periodically, after a certain number of frames.
